Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine Ave/71st
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 71st, Loomis, 74th, and Racine, due to a festival and parade near Racine Ave/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 71st, Loomis, 74th, and Racine, due to a festival and parade near Racine Ave/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/116th
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 115th, Wentworth and 119th due to police activity near Halsted/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does tis affect my trip?

#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 115th, Wentworth, 119th, then resume their normal route due to police activity near Halsted/116th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence Ave/Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: EB 81 Lawrence buses are rrtd via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson, Marine Drive & Lawrence due to fire department activity near Lawrence Ave/Inner Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Clarendon, Wilson, Marine Drive, then resume their normal route on Lawrence due to fire department activity near Lawrence Ave/Inner Lake Shore Drive.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Reroute near Fairbanks/Ohio
ShortDescription: 124 buses temp. rerouted EB Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks, Grand, State and Illinois WB Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, Michigan and Madison, near Fairbanks/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Fairbanks/Ohio due to police activity near Fairbanks/Ohio.

Eastbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks, Grand, State and Illinois including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, Michigan and Madison.
